title: Interview Fundamentals
description: Core skills every interviewee needs, regardless of company or role

blocks.content: Interviewers aren't trying to trick you. They're trying to answer one question: **Will this person make my team better?** Everything else flows from this.
The best interview answers show how you think, not just what you know.
blocks.author: Former Google Hiring Manager

blocks.content: Treat the interview as a conversation, not an interrogation. Interviewers want you to succeed.

items.text: Research the company's recent news and products
Prepare 3-5 stories using the STAR method
Review the job description and match your experience

blocks.content: Never say you have no questions. It signals lack of interest.
